      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deal()
      Deals cards from the perspective of userPlayer; starting with player whose seating order is just higher than userPlayer and continue clockwise Step 1: re-orders getPlayers() Step 2: deals cards; TODO deal in 2s Step 3: restore original getPlayers() order, which is the play order last ordered by GameActivity.drawToDecideSeating

      • initRound

        public void initRound()
        Initializes round: - Creates RoundPlayer for each GamePlayer and adds to players array - Assigns roundOwner (the one on whose behalf CPU deals cards, and who has the first turn); todo this is currently assigned to user, should be .... - Initializes and shuffles round deck

      • shuffleDeck

        private void dumpRound()

      • deal

        public void deal()
        Deals cards from the perspective of userPlayer; starting with player whose seating order is just higher than userPlayer and continue clockwise Step 1: re-orders getPlayers() Step 2: deals cards; TODO deal in 2s Step 3: restore original getPlayers() order, which is the play order last ordered by GameActivity.drawToDecideSeating

      • startPlay

        public void startPlay()

        - flags users: turnPlayer and previousTurnPlayer - updates stage flags: DRAW, REJECT - notifies listeners TODO Collections.rotate(list,distance);
